title: VISUAL

alt.Chart (cars, title= "Viz 1").mark_point().encode(
    alt.X('Miles_per_Gallon'),
    alt.Y('Weight_in_lbs'),
    tooltip=[
        'Miles_per_Gallon',
        'Weight_in_lbs'

).interactive()
